duties_responsibilities.duty: Perform quality testing on incoming raw materials and final products, including sampling and analysis for RM/Intermediate/Finished Goods.
Maintain and operate analytical equipment, ensuring timely analysis of samples and proper maintenance of laboratory instruments.
Adhere to strict safety regulations and collaborate with the Research & Development group.
Contribute to batch-wise timelines, quantity, and quality, and maintain ISO and other Quality system into the department.
Participate in Emergency response team and guide/train other team members in case of Emergency.
Maintain analytical records/log sheets as per GMP & ISO guidelines and give timely reports to SAP for result recording.

education_certification.credential: BA/BS in chemistry or science-related field preferred, or equivalent from two-year college or technical school
